title: Evening Dinner
description:
【A selfish Guy x A dreamer Virgin】Kyosuke, a college student bound for Tokyo dreaming of a ｢Destined Love｣ talked to Subaru an Ikemen (Super Hot Guy) he saw at a Gay bar. ｢I'd make you feel so good, it's to die for｣ under the drunken influence, they went straight in to a hotel, which for Kyosuke is his ｢first time｣ having sex. Their physical compatibility was the best however... 
After that Kyosuke got irritated with Subaru's attitude and decided never to see him again. But, it turns out they live in the same sharehouse?!
